room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: My wife and I took our 4 kids with us (17, 15, 11, 8) and we had a blast. All 4 kids were engaged and involved solving each of the puzzles. They started using teamwork on side puzzles as we worked on other puzzles. We will definitely be coming back for another adventure.

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: Had a really good time this past weekend at Breakout Cincinnati. The Museum Heist was a lot of fun and it definitely keeps you thinking. Shout out to Stephanie, she was very friendly and polite. Can't wait to be back for other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Museum Heist" by Breakout Games - Cincinnati in Cincinnati
review: I received this as my Christmas gift. I wasn't sure what to expect, but our family and friends had an absolutely wonderful time! We did the "Museum Heist" and loved the quirky clues, puzzles and overall task. We can't wait to go back! You must try it!
